languages.text: "Не думаю, что могу сомневаться в обоснованности обвинения, но..." {n}Вицент осекается и будто на мгновение уходит в себя. Перед тем, как ответить, он набирает в легкие побольше воздуха.{/n} "Я также не уверен, что у рода Версериан была причина предавать вас, Ваша Светлость. Мне неизвестны случаи, когда их верность Императору и вам ставилась под сомнение".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что могу сомневаться в честности губернатора Драйвстема и представленных им доказательствах вины дома Версериан, но..." {n}Вицент осекается и будто на мгновение уходит в себя. Перед тем, как ответить, он набирает в легкие побольше воздуха.{/n} "Я также не уверен, что у рода Версериан была причина предавать вас, Ваша Светлость. Мне неизвестны случаи, когда их верность Императору и вам ставилась под сомнение".
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "I do not think I can doubt the validity of the accusations, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to retreat into himself for a moment. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что могу сомневаться в обоснованности обвинения, но..." {n}Вицент осекается и будто на мгновение уходит в себя. Перед тем, как ответить, он набирает в легкие побольше воздуха.{/n} "Я также не уверен, что у рода Версериан была причина предавать вас, Ваша Светлость. Мне неизвестны случаи, когда их верность Императору и вам ставилась под сомнение".

traits.locale_text: "I do not think that I can doubt the validity of the accusation, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to withdraw into himself. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that the House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any cases when their loyalty to you and to the Emperor had ever been questioned."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: 「告訴の正当性は疑えません。ですが…」{n}ヴィセントの声が次第に小さくなり、事切れたように黙り込む。それから言葉を続ける前に、大きく息を吸う。{/n}「陛下、ウェルザリアン家にあなたを裏切る理由があるとも思えないのです。ウェルザリアン家の、陛下と皇帝に対する忠誠心が揺るぎないものでなかったことなど、私には全く考えられません」
languages.original_text: "I do not think I can doubt the validity of the accusations, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to retreat into himself for a moment. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."

traits.locale_text: 「告訴の正当性は疑えません。ですが…」{n}ヴィセントの声が次第に小さくなり、事切れたように黙り込む。それから言葉を続ける前に、大きく息を吸う。{/n}「陛下、ウェルザリアン家にあなたを裏切る理由があるとも思えないのです。ウェルザリアン家の、陛下と皇帝に対する忠誠心が揺るぎないものでなかったことなど、私には全く考えられません」
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: “我没有资格质疑此项指控的真实性，可是……”{n}文森特的声音越来越低，几不可闻。他深吸了一口气，再度开口道。{/n}“我同样无法确定韦尔森家族是否有理由背叛您，大人。至少我从未听说过韦尔森家族任何人曾对您或对神皇不忠，他们的忠诚不容置疑。”
languages.original_text: "I do not think I can doubt the validity of the accusations, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to retreat into himself for a moment. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."

traits.locale_text: “我没有资格质疑此项指控的真实性，可是……”{n}文森特的声音越来越小，几不可闻。他深吸了一口气，再度开口道。{/n}“我同样无法确定韦尔森家族是否有理由背叛您，大人。至少我从未听说过韦尔森家族任何人曾对您或对神皇不忠。”
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: « Je ne pense pas pouvoir douter de la validité de ces accusations, mais... » {n}Sa phrase reste en suspens un instant, comme s'il s'était soudain plongé dans une intense introspection. Il prend une grande inspiration avant de poursuivre.{/n} « Je ne vois pas non plus pourquoi la maison Werserian vous aurait {mf|trahi|trahie}, Votre Seigneurie. Jamais encore ils n'avaient donné matière à remettre en question leur loyauté envers vous et l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "I do not think I can doubt the validity of the accusations, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to retreat into himself for a moment. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne pense pas pouvoir douter de la validité de ces accusations, mais... » {n}Sa phrase reste en suspens un instant, comme si Vicent s'était subitement éteint. Il prend une grande inspiration avant de poursuivre.{/n} « Je ne vois pas non plus pourquoi la maison Werserian vous aurait {mf|trahi|trahie}, Votre Seigneurie. Jamais encore ils n'avaient donné matière à remettre en question leur loyauté envers vous et l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: «No creo que pueda poner en duda la validez de las acusaciones, pero...». {n}Vicent deja la frase en el aire y parece perderse en sus pensamientos durante unos momentos. Antes de continuar, respira hondo.{/n} «Tampoco estoy seguro de que la casa Werserian tuviera una razón para traicionar{mf|le|la}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No tengo conocimiento de ninguna instancia en la que su lealtad hacia usted o hacia el Emperador haya vacilado lo más mínimo».
languages.original_text: "I do not think I can doubt the validity of the accusations, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to retreat into himself for a moment. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."

traits.locale_text: «No creo que pueda poner en duda la validez de la acusación, pero...». {n}La voz de Vicent se entrecorta y parece haberse desconectado. Antes de continuar, respira hondo.{/n} «Tampoco estoy seguro de que la casa Werserian tuviera una razón para traicionar{mf|le|la}, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No soy conocedor de ninguna ocasión en la que se haya podido cuestionar su lealtad hacia usted o hacia el Emperador».
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Anhaltspunkte, dass die Anschuldigungen falsch sind, aber ..." {n}Vicent verstummt und scheint sich einen Augenblick lang in sich selbst zurückzuziehen. Bevor er fortfährt, atmet er tief durch.{/n} "Ich bin mir auch nicht sicher, ob das Haus Werserian einen Grund hätte, Euch zu verraten, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich weiß von keinem Fall, in dem seine Loyalität Euch und dem Imperator gegenüber je in Frage gestellt worden wäre."
languages.original_text: "I do not think I can doubt the validity of the accusations, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to retreat into himself for a moment. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Anhaltspunkte, dass die Anschuldigungen falsch sind, aber ..." {n}Vicent verstummt, als wäre er abgeschaltet worden. Bevor er fortfährt, atmet er tief durch.{/n} "Ich bin mir auch nicht sicher, ob das Haus Werserian einen Grund hätte, Euch zu verraten, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich weiß von keinem Fall, in dem seine Loyalität Euch und dem Imperator gegenüber je in Frage gestellt worden wäre."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak

languages.text: "İthamların geçerliğinden şüphe duymam söz konusu değil ama..." {n}Vicent, sesi kopup giderken bir anlığına içine kapanır gibi oluyor. Sözlerine devam etmeden evvel derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi'nin size ihanet etmek için bir sebebi olduğunu da sanmıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bildiğim kadarıyla size ve İmparator'a sadakatte kusur gösterdikleri tek bir hadise yok."
languages.original_text: "I do not think I can doubt the validity of the accusations, but..." {n}Vicent's voice trails off and he seems to retreat into himself for a moment. Before continuing, he takes a deep breath.{/n} "I am also not sure that House Werserian had a reason to betray you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not know of any instance where their loyalty to you and the Emperor was anything less than unwavering."

traits.locale_text: "İthamların geçerliğinden şüphe duymam söz konusu değil ama..." {n}Vicent, sesi kopup giderken bir anlığına içine kapanır gibi oluyor. Sözlerine devam etmeden evvel derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi'nin size ihanet etmek için bir sebebi olduğunu da sanmıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bildiğim kadarıyla size ve İmparator'a sadakatte kusur gösterdikleri tek bir hadise yok."
traits.speaker: YoungGaprak
